新闻| NME https://www.nme.com/news NME为您带来最新的音乐和流行文化新闻和评论，以及视频和画廊，乐队功能，音乐会门票，杂志，广播等。星期一，2025年4月7日08:20:27 +0000 en-gb小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.7.2 观看埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran https://www.nme.com/news/music/watch-es-sheeran-play-sirprise-pop-pop-up-show-at-t-londons-kings-kings-cross-cross-station-3852406?u tm_source = rss＆utm_medium = rss＆utm_campaign = watch-ed-ed-ed-sheeran-play-play-sirprise-pop-pop-up-pop-pop-up-at-at londons-kings-cross-cross-stationTom Skinner Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:16:02 +0000 Music NewsNewsPop https://www.nme.com/?p=3852406

他还“画了一辆红色的伦敦公共汽车粉红色”，并在顶层甲板上交付了一套

在伦敦国王的越野车站上的邮报埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在NME上首次出现在伦敦国王的越野车站。

;

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）于周五（4月4日）在伦敦的国王十字车站（King's Cross Station）播放了一个惊喜弹出式节目 - 查看下面的录像和图像。

  • 阅读更多： 埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran） - “秋季变化”评论：南瓜辣酱

这位歌手兼作曲家将传球者用作六首歌的声音，其中包括他的新单曲“ Azizam”的表演。根据setList.fm的说法，他还用“山上的城堡”，“颤抖”，“完美”，“你的形状”和“坏习惯”粉尘。

根据新闻稿，希兰（Sheeran）庆祝了他的回归，通过对待一群粉丝在伦敦市中心的粉红色双层巴士的顶部进行演出，然后他出现在国王的十字架外面。

据说这些表演捕捉到了艺术家即将发行的新专辑“ Play”的“精神”，这是“关于乐趣，联系和使人们聚集在一起的”。

描述写道：“在世界各地的体育场旋风中，个人粉丝的互动可能很少见，这次活动使ED有机会与他的支持者更加亲密地联系。”

“这是他计划在整个'Play'运动中继续进行的联系。”

从那以后，粉丝们一直在社交媒体上分享即兴国王的交叉表演的镜头，并写了一篇文章：“走出国王的十字架，进行40分钟的埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）演出。世界以神秘的方式工作。”

另一个人说：“星期五午餐时间和埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在国王十字架外比赛！”

其他人分享了：“只是在公共汽车上与@edsheeran一起休闲的早晨，然后免费演出。狂野。”

您可以在下面看到一些帖子，以及一些官方照片。

在Instagram上查看此帖子

Ed Sheeran（@teddysphotos）共享的帖子

当然，为了庆祝，埃德在国王十字架上举行了休闲音乐会你真该死的伦敦很幸运 pic.twitter.com/qpyurqai3s

- sab （@sabbibou） 2025年4月4日

@edsheeran在伦敦的国王十字车站表演了一个惊喜演出，并给了我们午餐时间的梦想 pic.twitter.com/fuce8iphlr

- 英国大西洋唱片公司（@atlanticrcrdsuk） 2025年4月4日

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在伦敦国王十字架（King's Cross Station）外面的即兴音乐会让通勤者感到惊讶。

这位歌手在伦敦宣传他的新歌Azizam，这是他即将发行的专辑中的主打单曲 https://t.co/cxtq48ykdp pic.twitter.com/lfcprmorpv

- 2025年4月5日，天空新闻（@skynews）

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran ）

- P Cabrera （@pcabrera123） 2025年4月5日

走出国王十字架，以神秘的方式进行40分钟的Ed Sheeran World演出。Twitter.com/czxh46wisk

- 丹（@dandainess） 2025年4月4日

星期五午餐时间和埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在国王十字架外面玩！ pic.twitter.com/t8ie0zz1jo

- 斯图尔特·托马斯（@stuartthomas） 2025年4月4日

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在国王十字架（King's Cross）举行的#Busking会议上惊讶地吸引了粉丝！

他宣传他的新单曲Azizam（我亲爱的Farsi），他扮演颤抖之情，将通勤者变成了即时的人群。

Azizam现在已经出来了！ @edsheeran #edsheeran #azizam #londonbusking pic.twitter.com/dyl1z1bgwt

- Buskinlondon（@buskinlondon） 2025年4月6日

IK ZAG ED SHEERAN OP EN BUS VANDAAG。 pic.twitter.com/uk7khopbcb

- febe vangheluwe（@febevnghlw） 2025年4月4日

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在伦敦的一辆公共汽车上演出，庆祝发行“ azizam” pic.twitter.com/ixnvpuodmw

- 2000年代（@popculture2000s） 2025年4月4日

只是在公共汽车上与@edsheeran一起休闲的早晨，然后免费演出。荒野。 pic.twitter.com/yq3d2wd4bp

- 凯尔 （@justmeinnit） 2025年4月4日

Sheeran在Instagram上分享了一段有关表演的视频，他写道：“画了一辆红色的伦敦巴士粉红色，今天在城市周围进行了演出。

“我喜欢看到街上人们在'azizam''中的所有反应。

官方的“ Azizam”音乐视频跟随Sheeran，他以粉红色，心形的气球在美国和英国进行快乐的旅程。它包括参观他心爱的伊普斯维奇镇足球俱乐部，以及他最近在新奥尔良出人意料的街头表演的镜头。

“游戏”将遵循2023年的“减法”和“秋季变化” 。它会看到Sheeran“大胆地进入2025年的新阶段”，并与来自全球的制片人和作家合作，他即将发行的专辑。

Sheeran证实了他的新专辑上个月是“完成”的。后来，他在吉米·法伦（Jimmy Fallon）主演的《今晚秀》（Tonight Show）上露面时首次亮相，名为“旧电话” 。作为美国图表展上采访的一部分， 他透露了他接下来的五个录音室唱片的标题，并取笑了一张死后专辑的计划。

他解释说：“我想做10张[专辑]。” “我有点痴迷于[Quentin] Tarantino，我听说他正在拍10部电影，而且他有像Grindhouse这样的副项目。我想做10次，然后时不时地做一个附带项目。”

在其他地方，希兰（Sheeran）证实， 未来几个月将发布一条名为“蓝宝石”的新曲目。

在其他新闻中，据透露， Sheeran将于下周末在Coachella 2025扮演亲密的演出。

在伦敦国王的越野车站上的邮报埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在NME上首次出现在伦敦国王的越野车站。

; 原始的“丹尼斯威胁”演员杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）去世了https://www.nme.com/news/tv/original-dennis-the-menace-actor-jay-north-has-died-3852379?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=original-dennis-the-menace-actor-jay-north-has-diedSurej Singh Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:56:50 +0000 NewsTV News.. https://www.nme.com/?p=3852379

他还出现在诸如“叔叔的男人”，“露西秀”，“弗林特石喜剧小时”，“辛普森一家”等节目中

原始帖子“威胁丹尼斯”演员杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）去世了，首先出现在NME上。

;

Jay North是原始丹尼斯（Dennis）的威胁系列的明星去世，享年73岁。

这一消息是通过他在社交媒体上的丹尼斯（Dennis）威胁的丹尼斯（Dennis）威胁的联合主演确认的。据报道，北部在“战斗多年”后死亡。 “他经常给我们打电话，结束了与'我全心全意爱你'的每一次对话。我们和我们一起爱他。乔恩的一个终生的朋友，珍妮的兄弟，珍妮的兄弟，对我的亲爱的朋友，我们会非常想念他。他现在很痛苦。他现在痛苦不堪。他的痛苦已经结束。他最后一个和平。

珍妮·罗素（Jeanne Russell）只是为了难以置信的伤心，但并不意外的消息给我们打电话。我们亲爱的朋友杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）一直在战斗……

劳里·雅各布森（Laurie Jacobson）于2025年4月6日星期日发布

在1957年的电视首次亮相后，杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）开始在NBC综艺节目中出现更多露面，包括埃迪·费舍尔（Eddie Fisher）表演和埃德·沙利文（Ed Sullivan）的表演，以及像想要的西方人：死者或活着的人， 77 Sunset Strip ， Bronco and Colt。 45 。

然后，在1959年，享年6岁，赢得了丹尼斯·米切尔（Dennis Mitchell）在全国范围内受到的漫画漫画丹尼斯（Dennis）的首次亮相改编中。在1959年和1963年的年份之间，北部在四个季节中出演了146集，捕捉了美国和世界的心。

在丹尼斯（Dennis）威胁之后，杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）出现在叔叔的那个人， 《弗林特石》喜剧小时，露西秀，弗雷德·弗林特斯通和朋友，综合医院和辛普森一家等。在电影中，他出现在玛雅厨房的斑马，老师等等。

他的最后一次露面是以2003年的迪基·罗伯茨（Dickie Roberts）的形式出现的：前儿童明星。

1991年，诺斯（North）出现在电视脱口秀节目中，他透露他讨厌自己在丹尼斯（Dennis）的威胁上的时间- 不是因为电影的演员，而是因为剥削性电视行业，虐待年轻的明星，以及他的姑姑和叔叔的虐待 - 当时，他是由于他的守护者是因为他的守护者是因为他的单身母亲在工作中很忙。

杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）声称他的姑姑“会打我，身体虐待我。”他说：“我曾经每天早晨都在想，'我的上帝，我必须和这个女人一起度过一天吗？'因为我会进入场景，所以我会离开场景，每个人都说：“嘿，你做得很好。”然后，我会在脸上拍一巴掌，或带入更衣室，然后打屁股或口头舌头绑扎或其他任何东西。”

当被问及为什么他从未针对他的姑姑和叔叔提出报告时，他说的也是虐待的后者，他分享说他受到叔叔的威胁，以使虐待秘密或遭受后果。

除了大声疾呼反对虐待之外，诺斯还通过前儿童保罗·彼得森（Paul Petersen）创立的倡导组织通过倡导小组的指导儿童演员。

原始帖子“威胁丹尼斯”演员杰伊·诺斯（Jay North）去世了，首先出现在NME上。

; Pinkpantheress揭示了新混音带“ That that that”的曲目清单https://www.nme.com/news/music/pinkpantheress-reveals-tracklist-for-new-new-mixtape-fancy-that-that-that-that-3852390?u tm_source = rss＆utm_medium = rss＆utm_campaign = pinkpantheress-reveals-tracklist-for-new-mixtape-fangy-thatTom Skinner Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:22:10 +0000 Music NewsNewsPopR&B https://www.nme.com/?p=3852390

九首项目将于下个月到达

Pinkpantheress的帖子揭示了新的混音带“ Fancy”首先出现在NME上的曲目列表。

;

Pinkpantheress透露了她即将推出的第二张混音带的曲目清单，这是标题为“ Fancy That”的曲目。在下面查看。

  • 阅读更多：封面上的Pinkpantheress：“我不在乎节拍，我关心笔”

这位歌手兼作曲家将于5月9日星期五发布2021年“与之地狱”的后续行动。她于2023年放弃了她的首张录音室专辑“ Heaven Newer” 。

在上周分享了单曲“ Tonight” （以及Bridgerton启发的音乐视频）之后，Pinkpantheress昨晚（4月6日）上了社交媒体，以发布完整的曲目列表的下一个混音带。

这是为了回应粉丝呼吁艺术家发布曲目“罗密欧”。 pinkpantheress写道：“提早发布da tractlist只是为了让大家知道这是九个轨道 。”

其他歌曲标题包括“非法”，“中间”，“噪音”和“很高兴认识您”。您可以在下面的帖子中看到艺术品，以及曲目列表。

尽早发布da跟踪列表，只是让大家知道这是九个轨道 https://t.co/vbptzs4wth pic.twitter.com/hpzdjevkl9

- pinkpantheress（@pinkpantheress2） 2025年4月6日

pinkpantheress的曲目列表''that'ep是：

1。“非法”
2。“像我一样的女孩”
3。'今晚'
4。“星星”
5。“中场休息”
6。“噪声”
7。“很高兴认识你”
8。“美国”
9。'罗密欧'

5月9日 pic.twitter.com/zdy4m4yay9

- pinkpantheress（@pinkpantheress2） 2025年3月26日

一月份，Pinkpantheress宣布她“ Soooo Rack”今年发行新音乐。

上周，她与丛林，信心人（DJ Set）和玛丽·戴维森（Marie Davidson ）等人一起宣布了格拉斯顿伯里2025年的银色海斯地区。

NME 在对Pinkpantheress的首张专辑的四星级评论中写道：“最终，使'天堂知道'的最引人注目的首次亮相的是它创造英国狂喜的能力。情感和声音足够熟悉，足以吸引您进入，并奇怪地让您留下来。天堂知道Pink的才华的界限。”

NME还审查了她2024年“能够爱”巡回演出的伦敦日期，授予了《四明星》，并将其描述为“无情的盛会”，该节目是“在舞台上展示她的新发现信心的发射台”。

Pinkpantheress去年夏天不得不取消一连串的巡回演出“专注于她的身体健康和整体健康” 。这意味着她将不再是2024年第2024号田间比赛，也不会在他们的“ Spheres of Spheres”世界巡回演唱会中开放。

Pinkpantheress的帖子揭示了新的混音带“ Fancy”首先出现在NME上的曲目列表。

; 即将在亚洲举行的K-Pop音乐会，巡回演出和音乐节：Gfriend，J-Hope，Day6等https://www.nme.com/news/music/kpop-concert-tour-music-festival-asia-sea-tickets-dates-3344654?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=kpop-concert-tour-music-festival-asia-sea-tickets-datesNME Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:14:48 +0000 Music NewsNewsK-pop https://www.nme.com/?p=3344654

获取所有信息（场地，日期，票价等），在Taeyeon的2025年旅行中，生命之吻，NCT等等

即将在亚洲举行的K-Pop音乐会，巡回演出和音乐节：GFriend，J-Hope，Day6等人首次出现在NME上。

;

边界是开放的，现场音乐又回来了， K-Pop巡回演出周期如火如荼。包括经验丰富的偶像Griend ，第6天， J-Hope等的明星正在以新的和旧的曲调巡回演出 - 很快就会击中亚洲。

尽管其中一些艺术家正在展开自己的标题节目，但其他艺术家则参加了音乐节的阵容，其中包括多流派和仅Hallyu的阵容。最近的公告越来越快，因此NME决定为2025年在亚洲举行的K-Pop音乐会和音乐节提供方便的清单。

向下滚动以查看您最喜欢的K-Pop艺术家是否正在巡回亚洲，并获取有关城市，约会，场地，门票等的信息。

J-Hope

2025年“舞台上的希望”世界巡回赛 - 马尼拉，锡塔玛，新加坡，雅加达，曼谷，澳门，台北和大阪

2025年4月
星期六12至周日13 - 马尼拉，菲律宾，亚洲竞技场的SM购物中心
星期六19至星期日20 - 日本锡塔玛
星期六26至星期日27 - 新加坡，新加坡，室内体育场

2025年5月
星期六3至星期日4 - 印度尼西亚雅加达竞技场GBK
星期六10至星期日11 - 泰国曼谷，撞击竞技场
星期六17至周日18 - 台湾，台湾，NTSU竞技场
星期六31 - 日本大阪，京都圆顶

2025年6月
星期日1 - 日本大阪，京都圆顶

BTS说唱歌手J-Hope最近宣布了他即将举行的“舞台上的希望”世界巡回演唱会，其中包括在美国和亚洲举行的音乐会。这次巡回演出将从2月28日至3月2日在首尔的KSPO圆顶举行的三晚音乐会开始，然后他将巡回演出带到了两个大洲的14个城市，每人都有两个晚上。

Blackpink

2025年至2026年世界巡回赛- 戈阳和东京

2025年7月
星期六5至周日6 - 韩国戈阳，戈阳体育场

2026年1月
星期五16至周日18 - 日本东京，东京圆顶

Blackpink宣布了他们备受期待的世界巡回演唱会的第一批停靠站，将于今年7月开始在韩国Goyang Stadium举行的两晚表演。乐队将在今年剩余的时间里前往北美和欧洲参加几场演出，然后于2026年初在日本东京圆顶进行为期三天的演出。将宣布更多日期。

2NE1

2024年至2025年“欢迎回来”世界巡回赛 - 首尔

2025年4月
星期六12至周日13 - 韩国首尔，KSPO圆顶（Encore）

7月21日，YG Entertainment在2016年解散八年后八年来宣布了他们的团圆。不久之后，该标签正式宣布，标志性的四重奏将着手进行亚洲的团圆世界巡回演唱会。到目前为止，所有日期和停车都被售罄，吉隆坡，胡志明和澳门直到最近才被添加到巡回演出中。

Le Sserafim

2025年“轻松疯狂热门”之旅 - 仁川，名古屋，大阪，kitakyushu，saitama，台北，香港，马尼拉，曼谷和新加坡

2025年4月
星期六19至星期日20 - 韩国仁川，激发竞技场

2025年5月
星期二6至星期三7 - 日本名古屋，名古屋国际展览馆
星期二13至14周三 - 日本大阪大阪霍尔大厅

2025年6月
星期六7至周日8 - 西日本一般展览中心附件，日本日本Kitakyushu
星期四12，星期六14和星期日15 - 日本西塔玛，西塔玛超级竞技场

2025年7月
星期六19 - 台湾，台湾，NTSU Arena（Linkou Arena）
星期六26 - 中国香港，亚洲 - 艾琳娜

2025年8月
星期六2 - 马尼拉，菲律宾，亚洲竞技场购物中心
星期六9至周日10 - 曼谷，泰国，雷霆圆顶
星期六16 - 新加坡，新加坡，室内体育场

Le Sserafim宣布了即将举行的2025年“ Easy Crazy Hot”之旅的第一个约会，从亚洲腿开始。尽管尚未公开特定的场所，但Hybe Girl Group将在韩国仁川的两晚表演中开始事情，然后从5月到八月巡回日本和东南亚的几个城市。

凯

Following the release of her sixth solo mini-album 'Letter To Myself' last November, Girls' Generation leader and soloist Taeyeon has announced her latest 'The Tense' solo tour. Kicking off this March with a three-night concert in Seoul, the upcoming tour will see the K-pop icon performing across major East and Southeast Asian in the first half of 2025, including Taipei, Manila, Singapore and more.

Saturday 12 – Taipei, Taiwan, Taipei International Convention Center

Girls' Generation vocalist Tiffany is set to embark on a tour of Asia as part of her 2025 'Here For You' fan-concerts, the three stops of which has been announced to be Bangkok, Ho Chi Minh and Taipei. It remains unclear if she has plans to visit more cities around Asia.

GOT7

2025年5月
Friday 2 to Saturday 3 – Bangkok, Thailand, Rajamangala National Stadium

After the band reunited earlier this year for their 11th debut anniversary and the release of the 'Winter Heptagon' album, GOT7 are bringing their 'Nestfest' concert to Bangkok's Rajamangala National Stadium this May after performing in Seoul in January. Both pre-sale and general on-sale for tickets to the show go live on April 5 via thaiticketmajor.com .

They will kick off with a four-night show at Seoul's Olympic Hall, before they play shows in cities across Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Southeast Asia and more.

2025 'Serenades & Body Rolls' world tour – Kuala Lumpur, Taipei, Bangkok, Manila, Jakarta and Singapore

June 2025
 Saturday 14 – Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Zepp KL
Thursday 19 – Taipei, Taiwan, Zepp New Taipei
Sunday 22 – Bangkok, Thailand, UOB Live
Saturday 28 – Manila, the Philippines, New Frontier Theater

July 2025
 Saturday 12 – Jakarta, Indonesia, The Kasablanka Hall
Saturday 19 – Singapore, Singapore, Capitol Theatre

Korean-American singer Jay Park will be embarking on his first tour in six years titled the 'Serenades & Body Rolls' world tour, where he will be playing shows in Asia, Australia and New Zealand with nine stops announced so far. At the time of announcement, Jay Park said the tour would celebrate the 10th anniversary of his hit single 'Mommae'.

ATEEZ

2025 'In Your Fantasy' world tour – Incheon, Saitama, Nagoya and Kobe

July 2025
 Saturday 5 to Sunday 6 – Incheon, South Korea, Inspire Arena

September 2025
 Saturday 13 to Monday 15 – Saitama, Japan, Saitama Super Arena
Saturday 20 to Sunday 21 – Nagoya, Japan, Port Messe Nagoya

October 2025
 Wednesday 22 to Thursday 23 – Kobe, Japan, Glion Arena Kobe

The KQ Entertainment boyband announced their 2025 'In Your Fantasy' world tour, so far featuring 15 stops across North American, Japan, South Korea and more. For its Asian leg, ATEEZ will kick off the tour with two nights at the Inspire Arena in Incheon, before returning to perform in three Japanese cities from September to October.

; 'Billy Joel: And So It Goes' documentary to open Tribeca Festival 2025 https://www.nme.com/news/music/billy-joel-and-so-it-goes-documentary-to-open-tribeca-festival-2025-3852368?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=billy-joel-and-so-it-goes-documentary-to-open-tribeca-festival-2025Tom Skinner Mon, 07 Apr 2025 06:34:27 +0000 Music NewsNewsTV NewsPopRock https://www.nme.com/?p=3852368

The two-part project explores "the love, loss and personal struggles that fuel his songwriting"

The post 'Billy Joel: And So It Goes' documentary to open Tribeca Festival 2025 appeared first on NME .

;

The forthcoming new Billy Joel documentary will open the Tribeca Festival 2025, it has been announced.

Billy Joel: And So It Goes – a two-part doc directed by Susan Lacy and Jessica Levin – is set to air on HBO this summer, as was revealed last month.

The project will examine Joel's life and music, “exploring the love, loss and personal struggles that fuel his songwriting”. It'll feature access to never-before-seen performances, home movies, and personal photographs, along with one-on-one interviews.

Now, it's been confirmed that …And So It Goes will debut at the Beacon Theatre in New York City during the first night of this year's Tribeca Festival on June 4.

Jane Rosenthal, co-founder and CEO of Tribeca Festival and Tribeca Enterprises, commented: “For nearly 25 years, the Tribeca Festival has celebrated the artists who give New York its heart and soul, and on the opening night of the 2025 Festival, we are thrilled to honor Billy Joel – an artist who has embodied that very spirit.

“Paying tribute to the legendary performer who captured the essence of a 'New York State Of Mind' is a perfect way to kick off this year's celebration of creativity and inspiration.”
Lacy said: “I and my co-director, Jessica Levin, couldn't be more thrilled about our film Billy Joel: And So It Goes opening the esteemed Tribeca Festival.

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Tribeca (@tribeca)

“Our thanks go out to Jane Rosenthal and the Festival team and to HBO and the wonderful folks there who have supported us throughout in our efforts to bring an in-depth, honest and musically expressive portrait of this complex talent.”

She added: “We are beyond appreciative of Billy Joel's trust in us to bring his story to the screen. There is no better place for this film to premiere than at the Beacon Theater, the venue for so many historic musical events for decades, and in the city so important to Billy Joel.”

You can find ticket information here . Check out the announcement post above.

The full schedule for the 2025 edition of the event – including film, music, TV, audio storytelling, talks and more – is expected to be announced soon.

Lacy – who created PBS' American Masters series and has helmed HBO docs such as docs Jane Fonda In Five Acts and Spielberg – previously explained: “For those who think they know Joel's story, as well as those who are not as familiar, I believe this two-part film is both a revelation and a surprise.

“I was drawn to his story as someone who knew little at the outset, and was astounded at how autobiographical his songs are and how complex his story is. We are gratified that Bill trusted us with his story, which we have told as honestly as possible, diving into territory which has not been explored before.”

An exact release date for Billy Joel: And So It Goes has not yet been confirmed.

Meanwhile, Billy Joel recently postponed his planned UK shows for this summer until next year due to health reasons . He'll return to the stage in North America this July.

The post 'Billy Joel: And So It Goes' documentary to open Tribeca Festival 2025 appeared first on NME .

; BTS' Jin shocks in new preview for Netflix variety show 'Kian's Bizarre B&B' https://www.nme.com/news/tv/netflix-teaser-variety-show-kians-bizarre-bb-bts-jin-3845536?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=netflix-teaser-variety-show-kians-bizarre-bb-bts-jinCarmen Chin Mon, 07 Apr 2025 06:18:13 +0000 Music NewsNewsTV NewsK-popNetflix https://www.nme.com/?p=3845536

It premieres on the streaming platform tomorrow

The post BTS' Jin shocks in new preview for Netflix variety show 'Kian's Bizarre B&B' appeared first on NME .

;

Netflix has shared a brand-new preview for upcoming variety series Kian's Bizarre B&B , starring BTS singer Jin and more.

  • READ MORE: 'Buried Hearts' review: a tangled web of deceit

The preview, shared by Netflix on April 6, offers a glimpse into the first time the main trio of the show met to film the show. Beloved webtoon artist-turned-entertainer Kian tells the crew that he is excited for SNL Korea comedian Ji Ye-eun to join him as they run a bed-and-breakfast together on Ulleungdo island. However, he knows nothing about the third cast member other than the fact that “they're a top star”.

When BTS singer Jin unexpectedly makes his appearance, Kian84 and Ji Ye-eun are shocked. “He's BTS,” Ji says in disbelief, to which Jin jokingly replies, “How did they know [that I'm a member of BTS]?” The atmosphere after is awkward, but sets the stage for the growth of the chemistry between the trio as the show chugs along.

Kian's Bizarre B&B is the latest variety offering from the creators of hit show Hyori's Bed & Breakfast, touted by Netflix as a show “all about the fun and unpredictability of trying something new, with your friends helping you every step of the way”. The unscripted series is scheduled to premiere its first three episodes on April 8, with new episodes dropping every week thereafter.

Kian's Bizarre B&B was first announced by Netflix in early February, as part of a preview of the streamer's upcoming slate of Korean originals to hit screens in 2025 . The show is part of a wider line-up of unscripted series from Netflix this year, with the likes of Culinary Class Wars season two, The Devil's Plan season two and more set to premiere before the year's end.

The post BTS' Jin shocks in new preview for Netflix variety show 'Kian's Bizarre B&B' appeared first on NME .

; 'Narcos: Mexico' actor in medically induced coma after “aggressive” bacterial infection https://www.nme.com/news/tv/narcos-mexico-actor-in-medically-induced-coma-after-aggressive-bacterial-infection-3852360?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=narcos-mexico-actor-in-medically-induced-coma-after-aggressive-bacterial-infectionSurej Singh Mon, 07 Apr 2025 05:09:04 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3852360

He is in "critical but stable condition"

The post 'Narcos: Mexico' actor in medically induced coma after “aggressive” bacterial infection appeared first on NME .

;

Narcos: Mexico actor Manuel Masalva has been placed in a medically induced coma – find out more below.

Per a Deadline report, Masalva has been placed is in a medically induced coma at a hospital in Dubai after contracting “very aggressive bacteria” and getting infected during a recent trip to the Philippines.

According to Jaime Jaramillo Espinosa, the CEO of Mexican management agency JIM Management and Masalva's manager, Masalva underwent emergency surgery late last month after complaining of internal discomfort and pain after the doctors discovered the bacteria.

The following day, the infection reached his lungs and he had to be put into a medically induced coma. Doctors have since been able to administer him with the necessary antibiotics, and have noted that Masalva's lungs are reaction favourable to the treatment. However, he still remains in critical but stable condition.

The actor's family have launched a GoFundMe campaign to raise funds to cover his treatment costs. The fundraised has reached over 1million Mexican Pesos – you can donate here .

Promoting the GoFundMe page, Masalva's close friend and fellow actor Mario Morán said in an Instagram video: “My brother is fighting for his life far from home. I want to ask for your help in this very difficult moment. As was made known yesterday, Manuel Masalva — who is one of my best friends [and] who is really like a brother to me — fell victim to an aggressive bacteria while he was on vacation. This led to him being in an induced coma and now his situation continues to be delicate.”

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Mario Morán (@_mariomoran)

“The medical costs are huge and in a country where everything is even more difficult. Any help, however small it may seem, can make a difference in this difficult moment. If you are able to help, I would thank you with all of my heart.”

Manuel Masalva is best known for the role of Ramón Arellano Félix in Netflix' Narcos spin-off Narcos: Mexico alongside Diego Luna, Bad Bunny and Scoot McNairy. He has also starred in the telenovela La Rosa de Guadalupe and recently the series La Guzmán .

The post 'Narcos: Mexico' actor in medically induced coma after “aggressive” bacterial infection appeared first on NME .

; Watch Mariah Carey embarrass her son during Twitch stream cameo https://www.nme.com/news/music/watch-mariah-carey-embarrass-her-son-during-twitch-stream-cameo-3852356?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=watch-mariah-carey-embarrass-her-son-during-twitch-stream-cameoSurej Singh Mon, 07 Apr 2025 03:42:27 +0000 Music NewsNewsPop https://www.nme.com/?p=3852356

“Mom, they can see you... oh my god”

The post Watch Mariah Carey embarrass her son during Twitch stream cameo appeared first on NME .

;

A clip of Mariah Carey embarrassing her son during his recent Twitch stream has gone viral – check it out below.

  • READ MORE: Mariah Carey: “You know what? I love Christmas!”

This past weekend, 13-year-old Moroccan “Rocky” Cannon, son to Mariah Carey and ex-husband Nick Cannon hosted a stream on Twitch. During the stream, he invited his mother and sister Monroe into his room for a moment, but soon regretted his decision.

After Mariah appeared onscreen, comments on Rocky's stream soon turned into an outpouring for the singer, leaving the 13-year-old embarrassed. “Mom, they can see you. They're saying, 'Hi Mariah, I love you,'” Rocky said before sighing and begging Mariah and Monroe to leave.

Carey replied, “Hi guys, I love you, too,” and Moroccan soon followed up with “Okay, y'all need to get out now. Can y'all please get out, please? Get out of my room!”

The clip has now gone viral on social media, with over 265,000 likes and 12,000 reposts on X (formerly Twitter). Watch the clip below.

Mariah Carey makes an appearance on her son's Twitch livestream. pic.twitter.com/yuU5qkaB2g

— Pop Crave (@PopCrave) April 5, 2025

Carey shares twins Moroccan and Monroe with ex-husband Nick Cannon. The couple got married in 2008 before separating in 2014 and finalising their divorce in 2016. Since then, Cannon has fathered five more children, bringing his total to 12 kids with six women including Mariah Carey.

This summer, Mariah Carey will play a huge show at the Royal Sandringham Estate in Norfolk alongside Eternal and Nile Rodgers & Chic . It goes down on August 15, and you can find any remaining tickets here .

The hitmaker has also been announced as one of the artists nominated for the Class Of 2025 Hall Of Fame – joining Cyndi Lauper , The White Stripes , Billy Idol , Joe Cocker , Oasis , New Order , Soundgarden , OutKast and more.

The post Watch Mariah Carey embarrass her son during Twitch stream cameo appeared first on NME .

; Woody Harrelson turned down 'The White Lotus' season three role to go on vacation https://www.nme.com/news/tv/woody-harrelson-turned-down-the-white-lotus-season-three-role-to-go-on-vacation-3852351?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=woody-harrelson-turned-down-the-white-lotus-season-three-role-to-go-on-vacationSurej Singh Mon, 07 Apr 2025 02:46:02 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3852351

Sam Rockwell was later cast in the role

The post Woody Harrelson turned down 'The White Lotus' season three role to go on vacation appeared first on NME .

;

Woody Harrelson has revealed why he turned down a role in the third season of The White Lotus – find out more below.

  • READ MORE: 'The White Lotus' season three review: irresistible holiday soap remains TV's most essential destination

Last week (April 2), The Hollywood Reporter published an oral history on the third season of The White Lotus , revealing that Harrelson was originally considered for both Walton Goggins ' and Sam Rockwell 's roles.

Harrelson had reportedly tried to get a pay bump, even going as far as to talk to Warner Bros. Discovery CEO David Zaslav directly to negotiate his salary, but was declined. Regardless, he signed on for the project but later dropped out, and was replaced by Sam Rockwell.

In a new statement to The Daily Beast , Harrelson has clarified that his exit wasn't due to money: “I was set to do White Lotus and very excited. Unfortunately, their production schedule shifted, and conflicted with a pre-planned family vacation, forcing me to make an extremely hard decision.”

Harrelson added of Rockwell in his statement: “Things must be meant to be though, because I couldn't have done as fantastic a job as Sam, who is killing it.”

It comes after Lily Allen recently revealed that she had a failed audition for the same show : “I did do a self-tape for The White Lotus and obviously did not get it. But I'm a bit scared of doing self-tapes.”

The third season of The White Lotus received a four-star review from NME , with Nick Levine writing: “A little sweetness definitely helps to balance out the prevailing saltiness. As the season progresses, the sneaky intricacy of White's plotting begins to yield surreal, shocking and genuinely hilarious moments.

“No one can write a scene where one character pretends not to remember another quite as exquisitely as White. Tanya may be gone, but this transgressive soap opera remains unique and completely jaw-dropping.”

The post Woody Harrelson turned down 'The White Lotus' season three role to go on vacation appeared first on NME .

; Watch Carrie Underwood join Papa Roach onstage for 'Last Resort' and more https://www.nme.com/news/music/watch-carrie-underwood-join-papa-roach-onstage-for-last-resort-and-more-3852337?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=watch-carrie-underwood-join-papa-roach-onstage-for-last-resort-and-moreSurej Singh Mon, 07 Apr 2025 02:02:05 +0000 Music NewsNewsCountryRock https://www.nme.com/?p=3852337

It marks the first time the two acts have performed together in front of a live audience

The post Watch Carrie Underwood join Papa Roach onstage for 'Last Resort' and more appeared first on NME .

;

Carrie Underwood has joined Papa Roach for a couple of songs at their recent Las Vegas concert – watch footage of it below.

  • READ MORE: Papa Roach talk mental health, Bring Me The Horizon and “pushing the boundaries” for their next album

While performing at the MGM Grand Garden Arena on Saturday (April 5), Jacoby Shaddix and co. brought out former American Idol winner and country star Underwood to join them for a performance of their collaborative track 'Leave A Light On (Talk Away The Dark)' .

Though the two acts have performed the track in the studio before , this marked the first time they've performed it together in front of an audience. Check out fan-shot footage of the performance below.

Later on in the night, Papa Roach once again brought out Underwood for their closing song, 'Last Resort'. “Where the fuck you at, Carrie? You know the words right?,” Shaddix asked before handing her a mic.

Watch Papa Roach and Carrie Underwood perform 'Last Resort' below.

Papa Roach teamed up with Underwood for the suicide prevention anthem 'Leave A Light On (Talk Away The Dark)' last year, donating a portion of its proceeds to the American Foundation of Suicide Prevention (AFSP) .

Speaking to NME about why the topic remains so close to their heart , Shaddix shared: “We've been singing about it since the beginning. Our first song, 'Last Resort' was about a cry for help. It's always been part of our story and a part of my life. I've had my own highs and lows and I've come to an understanding of how to grapple with it. I know the darkness, and by putting it into my music it's connected me with so many thousands upon thousands of people.

“Every day that I'm on tour, I'll meet somebody who will tell me these exact words: 'Your music saved my life.' That wasn't our intention when we started the music, but the more open and honest I got with the songs, the more I realised that I wasn't alone in my struggle.”

He continued: “I sit here as a testament of strength and hope, and that's what I want to share with the world. I want to give back because the fans have given us so much through all the years. They've given me the opportunity to chase this dream continuously and keep peeling back the layers of myself through this music. I've become more aware of my wounds and I just want to do good. I don't want to bleed on people, I want to patch it up and do right.”

As for Underwood, she recently made headlines when she showcased her heavy metal knowledge while judging a round of American Idol auditions , joining a contestant to sing along to Korn and Drowning Pool classics.

The post Watch Carrie Underwood join Papa Roach onstage for 'Last Resort' and more appeared first on NME .
